content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5) and offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using entities that are not connected
- Ensure that entities such as steam engines and offshore pumps are properly connected before attempting to use them.
### Errors when placing entities without checking for connection
- Make sure to check the connection status of entities before placing new entities to avoid errors.
### Errors when not checking entity status
- Always check the status of entities such as steam engines and offshore pumps to ensure they are working properly before attempting to use them.
